mdq:check.name: Provenance Process Step Code Present
mdq:check.description: Check that provenance process step software is specified.
mdq:check.code:
def call(): global output global status global provenanceProcessStepCode
import metadig.variable as mvar
# Provenace step source code is not present if 'provenanceProcessStepCode' not in globals() or provenanceProcessStepCode is None: output = "Provenance process step source code (software) was not found." status = "FAILURE" return False
# Convert all values to unicode provenanceProcessStepCode = mvar.toUnicode(provenanceProcessStepCode)
if (mvar.isBlank(provenanceProcessStepCode)): output = "The provenance process step code is blank." status = "FAILURE" return False else: # Check if provenance process step code is a single string or arrayList if(isinstance(provenanceProcessStepCode, unicode)): output = u"Provenance process step code '{}' was found".format(provenanceProcessStepCode) elif (isinstance(provenanceProcessStepCode, list)): output = u"A provenance process step code (software) '{}' was found (first of {})".format(provenanceProcessStepCode[0].strip(), len(provenanceProcessStepCode)) else: output = u"A provenance process step code (software)'{}' was found)".format(provenanceProcessStepCode.strip()) status = "SUCCESS" return True
